version_description:
- Вертикальная прокрутка в читалке
- Исправления и улучшения

Если у вас есть пожелания или вопросы по работе приложения, если вы столкнулись с проблемой – купили книгу, а она не скачалась, или появились проблемы со списанием денег – пожалуйста, напишите нам прямо из приложения (Настройки => Помощь => Поддержка).

Fixes and improvements.

Should you have questions on how the app works, new feature suggestions, or if you faced a problem with book purchase / download – please drop us a note (Settings => Help => Support).

– Audiobooks are now available in the app! You will find them on the main page;
– Full-featured player: controls for playback / pause, switching between chapters and rewinding, mini-player on the locked screen, changing the playback speed, sleep timer
– Fixes and improvements

– Audiobooks are now available in the app! You will find them on the main page;
– Full-featured player: controls for playback / pause, switching between chapters and rewinding, mini-player on the locked screen, changing the playback speed, sleep timer
